description: Situated a few minutes’ walk from London’s Aldgate East and Aldgate underground stations, The Gate stands as an iconic building at the gateway to the City of London, providing those who stay there with both unrivalled accessibility to the modern City of London and a beautiful place to return to and relax, entertain or work in after a busy day in the City. With a red-brick façade and clean modernist lines, The Gate is an instantly iconic addition to Aldgate neighbourhood. The Gate is a design led collection of modern Studios, One Bedroom and Two-Bedroom apartments that offer a wealth of features including fully equipped kitchens, luxury Hypnos beds, walk in showers with rainheads and exclusive Le Labo toiletries, flat-screen TVs with soundbars, Nespresso machines and fast, free WiFi throughout. Each of our beautiful designed rooms is a sanctuary, furnished to make you feel right at home. The Gate provides the perfect apart hotel experience for today’s modern corporate and leisure traveller alike, offering a wealth of additional features. There is a stunning 5th floor lounge and outdoor terrace, exclusively for guests and their visitors, to work, meet or relax with a premium glass of wine or beer from our state-of-the-art self-service bar. The Gate has also been designed for the health-conscious traveller with our gym fitted with the latest Technogym equipment, Peloton bikes and free weights, as well as massage, yoga instructors and personal trainers available upon request. Our food and beverage partner, Maple & Co. provides a delicious yet healthy range of hot meals, salads, cold press juices and gluten-free options as well as from our well-stocked Maple & The Gate delicatessen and café in the Ground Floor Lobby.

name: Hotel La Comtesse
description:
Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Paris does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel La Comtesse, a nice option for travelers like you.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Hotel La Comtesse features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. In addition, as a valued Hotel La Comtesse guest, you can enjoy a fitness center and breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Paris, Hotel La Comtesse is located a short distance from Louvre Museum (1.4 mi) and Arc de Triomphe (1.5 mi).
While in Paris, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Hotel La Comtesse, including 58 Tour Eiffel (0.7 mi), Le Jules Verne (0.6 mi), and L'Avenue (0.9 mi).
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Eiffel Tower (0.6 mi), Musée d'Orsay (1.0 mi), and Champs-Elysees (1.1 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Hotel La Comtesse puts the best of Paris at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
address: 29 Avenue De Tourville, 75007 Paris France

name: Hotel 34B - Astotel
description: You'll be amazed by the 100% French interiors at Hotel 34B. This 3-star hotel, ideal for a cultural holiday or shopping trip in Paris, is close to the Galeries Lafayette, Printemps Haussmann and Grand Boulevards. Culture fans will enjoy the hotel's closeness to the Folies Bergères, Opéra Garnier and Musée Grévin. Right next to a metro station on lines 8 and 9, you can travel all over Paris in a flash. A charming 3-star hotel in Paris' 9th arrondissement, with its delicate and detailed design, Hotel 34B stands out from the crowd. The interior decoration and French soul of the hotel ensure a purely Français experience! With its innovative and original design and 3-star service, you will be delighted by Hotel 34B. Stay in one of its 128 rooms, each decorated in an unusual style. Exceptional comfort with high quality, spacious 2-metre beds. Use the free WiFi to organise your days. Enjoy your breakfast with fresh and varied produce in the cosy lobby, then relax on the comfy sofas in the lounge. Travel guides and other books on France are at your disposal, to introduce you to the riches of the country and perhaps help you organise your trips. Soft drinks and snacks are available at the open bar in the afternoon. The attentive staff and warm atmosphere at Hotel 34B will make your stay in Paris truly memorable.

name: The Karl Lagerfeld
description: Created with a bold vision for iconic accommodations and aesthetics, THE KARL LAGERFELD sets a benchmark for extraordinary Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star hospitality. As the world's first and only hotel entirely designed by and named after the late fashion legend, the designer's imaginative, inimitable style and ethos are infused into its very DNA, from its architectural elements to the specially commissioned furniture and art. Each of the hotel's 271 rooms and suites, as well as its Spa, Gym and pools feature Karl Lagerfeld's bold, inspired blend of rock-chic aesthetics and elegant Chinoiserie elements. The signature restaurant, Mesa by José Avillez, translates his iconic tastes into an exquisite chic setting, while The Book Lounge is inspired by his home library in Paris. Discover fashion, luxury and beauty, fused together into a one-of-a-kind reflection of the world of Karl.

For those interested in checking out Taipa Village Macau (3.0 mi) while visiting Macau, Macau Peninsula Ritz-carlton is a short distance away.

name: Regency Art Hotel
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Macau? Then look no further than Regency Art Hotel, a hotel that brings the best of Macau to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and Regency Art Hotel makes getting online easy as free internet access is available.

Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Eiffel Tower Experience at Parisian Macau (1.4 mi) and AJ Hackett Macau Tower (1.6 mi), guests of Regency Art Hotel can easily experience some of Macau's most well known attractions.

Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular monuments and statues, such as Vasco da Gama Monument, Matteo Ricci Statue, and Arco Oriente.

If you like Italian restaurants, Century Plaza Hotel is conveniently located near Elba Italian Restaurant, PizzaExpress (ShenZhen), and La Terrazza - Grand Hyatt Shenzhen.
Shenzhen is also known for some great parks, including Shenzhen Lianhuashan Park, Lychee Park, and Shenzhen Central Park, which are not too far from Century Plaza Hotel.
Century Plaza Hotel puts the best of Shenzhen at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Mai Inci Hotel
description: Mai İnci Hotel is located in the center of Antalya, at a point within walking distance of historical and touristic places and places to visit. The facility, which was opened in September 2021, was built with a brand new architectural style. The rooms have all kinds of equipment and materials that the guests need and are designed in a completely comfortable way. Our hotel consists of 27 rooms in total, and our rooms are classified in 4 different categories. Economy class is categorized as standard double, superior rooms and deluxe rooms. Our hotel is one of the most suitable hotels in Antalya in terms of price and performance for honeymoon couples, families, summer vacation, New Year's holiday, February 14 holiday, etc. After a wonderful breakfast at our hotel, you can take a tour to the "Karpuzkaldıran Waterfall", Turkey's only waterfall pouring into the sea, by boats departing from the marina right in front of the hotel. After the boat returns to the port, you can take a romantic walk in the narrow streets smelling of history on the historical Kaleiçi peninsula, just behind the port, and enjoy your dinner at one of the venues in Kaleiçi, listening to live music and enjoying the sweet coolness of the breeze on your cheeks.

name: Rixos Downtown Antalya
description: Set in exotic gardens in Ataturk Culture Park, this 5-star hotel near Konyaalti Beach overlooks sea and Taurus Mountains. It offers 4 dining outlets, a lagoon-style pool and a free shuttle to the beach. Konyaalti Beach is 400 metres away. For those who like to work out, the luxurious Rixos Downtown provides a modern gym and 2 tennis courts. There is also a spa where guests can unwind in the Turkish bath, or with a relaxing massage treatment. The Rixos Lounge features a panoramic terrace and serves upscale international cuisine in chic surroundings, while the Beach Bar & Restaurant is located on Konyaalti Beach and offers an a la carte menu. The hotel also features a range of bars serving exotic cocktails and light snacks. The bright guest rooms are decorated with rich fabrics and offer a private balcony with views of Antalya or the Mediterranean Sea. They also have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a seating area with a couch.

name: The Story Hotel Pera
description: The building named after Kumbaracı Ramp, one of the most well-known streets of Beyoğlu consists of 24 rooms with a surface area of approximately 23-61 sq. meters and bar with a fireplace, restaurant and bistro.This building that attracts the attention of people walking by in Istiklal Street with its historical exteriors is located in Asmalı Mescit that became the center of not only our cultural heritage but also the entertainment with lively cafés and restaurants.Asmalı Mescit, the most well-known area of Beyoğlu and the most popular district of historical Pera resisting to being forgotten and defeated by time is the meeting point of entertainment lovers thanks to its night clubs and bars. Current historic fabric was restored with modern lines and it is surrounded by boutique hotels, restaurants and entertainment facilities. Thus Asmalımescit, the center of night life in Istanbul and the mirror of Beyoğlu not only entertains but also displays the finest details of cultural heritage. The building of The Story Hotel Pera dating back to early 1900s and matching with this location elegantly features the typical characteristics of French architecture that forms the architectural style of Beyoğlu predominantly. It was intended to create large suit rooms in this building which was decorated successfully to maximize the functionality. The Story Hotel Pera combines the modernism and history with its high ceilings, large passageways, marble spiral staircase and bar in the ground floor.

name: Princeps Boutique Hotel
description: Princeps Boutique Hotel occupies the fourth floor of one of the most elegant palaces of the historical Monti district, the first district in the heart of Rome. The majestic Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore stands right in front of the property. The warm and intimate reception/lobby (24h) and offices, introduce a unique breakfast room, divided in three environments and open to guests beyond the usual morning hours, so as to be suitable for a business meeting or as a reading room. Every morning you can start your day with a buffet-style breakfast including fresh fruit, bakery croissants and cakes as well as cold cuts, eggs and cheese. The hotel has 20 soundproofed rooms, all non-smoking, and diversified with and without views. Most rooms overlook the Basilica or the characteristic Monti area and the entire monumental Rome. The rooms, decorated in soft colors, specially chosen fabrics, hand-painted woodwork, beautiful floors and customized furnishings offer marble bathrooms with large shower, satellite TV, free wi-fi throughout the property, large size safe, mini-bar, air conditioned with individual control, hairdryer, and luxury toiletries. As a special Grand Opening promotion, free national and international phone calls are included in room fee. The hotel is located in a privileged and strategic position just 500 meters from Termini Station and even less from the subway stop Cavour. Princeps Boutique Hotel is in the centre of Rome's most authentic, lively district, where a continuous bustle of Romans and tourists - including shops, restaurants, wine bars, cafes, bakeries and boutiques - where the alleys are animated by countless picturesque views.

name: Hotel Della Conciliazione

Completely renovated, the Hotel della Conciliazione is composed of 67 rooms elegantly furnished and completely equipped with air conditioning , private bathroom with bath or shower , free Wi - fi , LCD TV with major satellite channels , mini bar and direct dial telephone. A bar and a restaurant where organize business meetings or events , and a young multilingual staff with customer-oriented attitude, will be dedicated to satisfy every need of our guests with suggestions for any necessity they may have regarding restaurants , City tours , transfers to the airport or to the city and any other service that will grant them an unforgettable stay in Rome with us . A Rich Home made Buffet Breakfast served for our guests every day , will offer a wide selection of "zero kilometers"products , gluten free, carefully selected to ensure a healthy choice for a complete breakfast . Even your children can enjoy a special breakfast with products designed specifically for them . The property is 10 minutes far, walking distance, from the metro station Ottaviano ( line A ) and from the station of San Pietro , directly connected though trains to / from Fiumicino Airport ( main airport of the city of Rome) . OUR SERVICES The brand new Hotel completely renovated to offer innovative technologies without in the charming atmosphere of a historic building , has an ancient well preserved facade , interior design refined , elegant furnishings and 67 rooms and junior suites completed equipped to offer all the services to satisfy any necessity with us during your stay : wi -fi connection, LCD TV with major satellite channels , mini bar , air conditioning , direct dial telephone . name: Phuket Graceland Resort & Spa
description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly resort in Patong does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Phuket Graceland Resort & Spa, a nice option for travelers like you.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Patong Mosque (0.2 mi) and Bangla Boxing Stadium (0.5 mi), guests of Phuket Graceland Hotel can easily experience some of Patong's most well known attractions.
Free internet access is offered to guests, and rooms at Phuket Graceland Hotel offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and a refrigerator.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a rooftop terrace, a concierge, and room service. Guests of Phuket Graceland Resort are also welcome to enjoy a rooftop pool and breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
Patong has plenty of seafood restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Baan Rim Pa Patong, No.6 Restaurant, and Sizzle Rooftop Restaurant, which are serving up some great dishes.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Patong Beach (0.6 mi), Bangla Road (0.7 mi), or Patong Boxing Stadium (0.6 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
Phuket Graceland Resort & Spa looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Patong.

description: Lub d Phuket Patong offers the biggest hostel accommodation in ASIA. Lub d Phuket Patong offers both private and dormitory rooms with air conditioning. This stylish hostel features an outdoor pool, co-working space, cool down room, restaurant and free WiFi. Private rooms at Lub d are complete with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, and a private bathroom. Some units have a minibar, a fridge or a coffee maker. Guests of dormitory rooms are provided with a personal locker, a safety deposit box and a towel. A hairdryer is available for both private and share accommodation. Room types: - Deluxe double room - Junior double/twin room - Comfort dorm - Comfort Ladies'dorm Guests of Lub d Patong may approach staff at the 24-hour front desk for luggage storage service. Interesting excursion trips can be arranged at the on-site tour desk. Laundry service, a shared lounge, and meeting facilities are also available. Within 1 km of the property, guests can find Jungcylon Shopping Centre, while Patong Pier and Kalim Beach can be reached under 1.8 km of the hostel. Phuket International Airport is 23 km away. Nestled in the heart of Kata Beach, one of the most sought-after destinations in Phuket, Thailand, our hotel offers a peaceful environment where guests can unwind and feel at home. Enjoy breathtaking sunset views from our spacious rooms, complete with clean and modern facilities. Most of the rooms equipped with a bathtub and balcony for ultimate relaxation.
Our staff, renowned for their exceptional service mind, is dedicated to ensuring that your stay is hassle-free and memorable. Stay connected with free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel and take advantage of our affordable transportation options, including airport transfers, taxi, car hire, shuttle services, and even an MG EV charger and motorbike rental for exploring Phuket at your own pace.
Indulge in our dining options, including a daily in-house breakfast. Relax and unwind at our beautiful pool and poolside bar or stay fit and firm at our fully-equipped gym. For those in need of a venue for meetings and events, we offer a function room that can accommodate your needs.
Experience local culture with our trusted tour options, including surfing, local market trips, hidden gems in Phuket and other activities that showcase the best of Phuket. Our hotel is family-friendly, with kid rooms, kid activities, and a pool with a dedicated kid section.
Located just 2km from Kata Beach, guests can easily access one of the most famous beaches in Phuket with our free shuttle service. Take advantage of our easy access to other local attractions, such as Big Buddha, Wat Chalong, Rawai for seafood, Chalong bay for a day trip to the famous Racha Island, or a sunset boat trip, Laem Promthep, Laem Krating or the best kept secret, Black Rock viewpoint. 
Choose The Yama Hotel Phuket for a trusted and unforgettable Phuket experience. Book now and discover why our past guests have rated us highly.

name: China Hotel
description: China Hotel, located at the heart of Guangzhou is just steps away from two iconic parks, providing a peaceful atmosphere for all leisure as well as business travelers. The hotel adjacent Guangzhou Metro line 2 connects you to all the famous tourist attractions as well as the Baiyun International Airport and the Guangzhou Railway Station which provide ease of access to all major metropolitan cities via flights and high-speed bullet trains. The hotel also features 40 periodic cross-border buses to/from Hong Kong and Macau, bridging you across the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area right from the hotel’s doorstep. Featuring 850 guestrooms, China Hotel presents a classic charm delicately blended with contemporary leisure and business facilities to make your stay the most pleasurable possible! Whether you want to work-out or just relax, our spacious Health Club offers everything you could need to keep in good shape or to unwind including an extensive range of the very best leisure facilities, from sauna, Jacuzzi, 24-hour Gymnasium to an outdoor swimming pool. Our dedicated chefs will take you on a culinary journey through Western and Asian cuisines. Grandiose 1200m2 Crystal Ballroom, a Diamond Room and seven Function Rooms are all complemented by friendly and efficient services from our banquet team – making every business event or social occasion an unparalleled success.

name: Shangri-La Guangzhou
description: Shangri-La Hotel, Guangzhou is located adjacent to the Canton Fair with less than 1 minute walking distance to Guangzhou International Convention and Exhibition Center. Surrounded by lush gardens on an island in the Pearl River, the hotel's 704 guestrooms offer amazing views through the floor-to-ceiling windows of the nearby Pearl River and the greenery on the other side. The hotel offers its guest complimentary Wi-Fi and broadband internet access in all guestrooms and public areas. During the Canton Fair period, the hotel offers complimentary shuttle bus services to the fair, with Wi-Fi available in the shuttle bus; guests can choose to take a walk or the shuttle between the hotel and the Canton Fair Complex. The Shangri-La offers a variety of dining options from East to West put together by award-winning chefs. Traditional Thai and fusion dishes are cooked up with imported herbs and spices at coolThai. Nadaman offers up the renowned menu of its worldwide Japanese fine dining chain. Guests looking for something more local can check out the regional Chinese offerings at Summer Palace. A selection of Asian favorites and contemporary international cuisine is available from the food-theater-style WOK TOO Cafe which provides both a la carte and buffet. Diners at the WOK TOO Cafe can eat inside the main dining hall, out in the garden or in one of the private dining rooms. Guests looking to eat Western cuisine can also head to il Forno, the hotel's Italian restaurant. Guests relaxing in the lush gardens around the outdoor swimming pool can indulge in a tropical cocktail or a light snack at the Poolside Bar & Grill. Live jazz performances accompany snacks and cocktails, coffee or afternoon tea in the Lobby Lounge. When night falls, guests can roll up to the Lift Bar on the second floor and enjoy drinks and snacks while looking out over the gardens and river. The flowing shape of this Guangzhou hotel's outdoor pool is lined by a tropical garden, giving guests a relaxing getaway from the hustle of bustling "Canton," and an indoor pool is also available.

name: Asia International Hotel
description:
Welcome to Asia International Hotel, your Guangzhou “home away from home.” Asia International Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Guangzhou, Asia International Hotel is located a short distance from Beijing Road Ancient Avenue (1.2 mi) and Muslim Hero Tomb (1.7 mi).
Rooms at Asia International Hotel offer air conditioning and a minibar providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
Room service and a concierge are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and an on-site restaurant will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Asia International Hotel, free parking is available.
Guangzhou has plenty of Chinese restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Dian Dou De (Ju FuLou), Bingsheng Pinwei Restaurant (Tianhe), and Haidilao Hot Pot (BeiJing Road), which are serving up some great dishes.
Guangzhou is also home to Leona Craig Art Gallery, a popular art gallery that is not too far from Asia International Hotel.
Asia International Hotel puts the best of Guangzhou at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Guangzhou Hotel
description:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Guangzhou, look no further than Guangzhou Hotel.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Guangzhou, Guangzhou Hotel is located a short distance from Beijing Road Ancient Avenue (0.8 mi) and Qingping Medicine Market (1.5 mi).
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Guangzhou Hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a sauna and an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to Guangzhou Hotel, parking is available.
Travelers looking to enjoy some dumplings  can head to Dian Dou De (Ju FuLou), Guangzhou Restaurant, or PanXi Restaurant. Otherwise, you may want to check out a seafood restaurant such as Tiger Prawn (Huifudong Road), GuangZhou Hong Xing Seafood Restaurant (QiaoGuang Road), or Lia Cafe.
Should time allow, Huaisheng Mosque, Sacred Heart Cathedral, and Temple of the Six Banyan Trees & Flower Pagoda (Liurong Temple) are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.
The staff at Guangzhou Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Guangzhou - Science City
description:
Located in the heart of the dynamic Guangzhou High Tech Development District, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Guangzhou Science City is adjacent to the Huangpu District Government Administration Office, and faces the beautiful Civil Park. The Guangzhou International Sports Arena is within walking distance of our modern hotel in Guangzhou Science City. Enjoy easy access to Sino-Singapore Knowledge City, the Guangzhou International Convention and Exhibition Center, Guangzhou Baiyun Airport, and Zeng Cheng District. Feel at home in a beautifully decorated guest room, equipped with WiFi, a 42-inch LCD TV with international satellite channels, and a seating area. Upgrade to an executive room or suite for a balcony with lake and garden views, and Executive Lounge access, with complimentary breakfast, cocktails(Please be noted that Executive Lounge is not available for now. Hotel will provider alternative choice: enjoy breakfast in the all-day dining restaurant· Elements,cocktail in Lobby bar·Lin Lounge) and 24 hour multi-language support. Start your day with breakfast in the all-day dining restaurant, Elements, savor Cantonese dishes in China House or indulge in authentic Chaoshan delicacies in the elegant Chao Shang Restaurant. Lin Lounge is the perfect place to meet friends or colleagues and sample a variety of specialty drinks and sweet treats. Energize in the 24 hour fitness center or swim in the outdoor pool, overlooking the hotel's private garden. With 22,000 sq.ft. meeting space, contemporary A/V technology, and a 24 hour business center, this hotel is ideal for business events and weddings for up to 800 people. Our friendly staff look forward to welcoming you at check-in with a signature, warm chocolate chip cookie.
【Shuttle Bus】
To provide you commute convenience, the hotel provide shuttle bus service,  details as per below:
Daily shuttle bus to Airport, free daily shuttle bus to downtown, free daily shuttle bus to Guangzhou Luogang Wanda Plaza, free Canton Fair shuttle bus etc. You can refer to photo gallery for each shuttle bus schedule.  Please note that all schedule will be adjusted according to hotel operation.

name: Crowne Plaza Guangzhou City Centre, an IHG hotel
description: 广州中心皇冠假日酒店位于环市东路，是沿线的星级标准国际品牌酒店，为市中心商业及购物区域。 广州中心皇冠假日酒店是广州的一张特色的城市明信片，曾是南中国第一高楼建筑，是老广州人口中的“63层”。酒店拥有四百余间优雅舒适的客房和套房，分别坐向珠城夜景及云山麓湖两大景色，令客人在繁华的市中心，仍能独享一方羊城天地。房间配有无线网络及可供客人选择的系列枕头菜单，让客人在繁忙的差旅途中仍能感受家的感觉。酒店步行约200米即可抵达淘金或小北地铁站，离北京路直线距离约2.5公里，距离广州琶洲展览中心直线距离约12公里。酒店行政总厨带领其资深的厨师团队，为海内外宾客打造能诠释广府美食天堂的2间不同特色主题的餐饮餐厅，它们分别为：主打“粤”菜特色的百粤楼；以及集无国界美食于一体的环市食坊自助餐厅。环市夜赏，是酒店的特色之一，也是旅客居停旅途上的必到之处。360度无边视觉，任意饱览火烧夕霞的羊城晚景，璀璨辉煌的珠江新城夜景，远眺小蛮腰-广州塔。再点上一杯特制的鸡尾酒，愿您与亲朋共度美好的居停时光，酒店更配有室外游泳池，生spa和桑拿等尊享设施。 广州中心皇冠假日酒店，第属于英国IHG洲际酒店集团。全球拥有超过5600间酒店单体，屡获殊荣的皇冠假日酒店及度假村品牌，在65个国家中拥有近426家酒店，是全球连锁高档酒店品牌之一。 广州中心皇冠假日酒店，致力助您成就高效商旅！ The new Crowne Plaza Guangzhou City Centre is an exclusive international 5-star hotel located on Huanshi Road East, the heart of downtown’s bustling commercial and shopping district. Crowne Plaza Guangzhou City Centre is located nearby Beijing Road, 2.5 km, one of the most popular tourist spot for Guangzhou historic stories and shopping district. Also, an airport express bus station is located at the hotel’s entrance, 7km to Guangzhou East Railway Station and walking distance 200m to Guangzhou Metro Station. The hotel features 460 well appointed guest rooms and suites with an extensive city or greenery view. Complimentary wi-fi and a collection of specialty pillows are on offer. Club floors with 73 rooms and suites offer personalized service and additional privacy for the needs of today’s busy executives. In addition, two superb restaurants and a lobby lounge are on offer, including Baiyuelou, a popular Cantonese restaurant featuring organic, fresh and healthy specialties; Appetite, all-day international dining hosted by engaging chefs in show-kitchens offers a lavish buffet selection; and the Lobby Lounge, offering a relaxing atmosphere where guests can enjoy a variety of cocktails, fine wines and beers, as well as an array of your favorite appetizers. Over 2,000 sq meters of meeting space includes a 985 square-meter pillar-less Crystal Ballroom with an impressive 9 meter high ceiling. The Pearl Ballroom, Diamond Boardroom and 9 Jade function rooms feature state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment.

name: Voco Makkah
description:
Embark on the spiritual journey of a lifetime with voco Makkah by your side every step of the way. Our prime location near Haram is ideal for Hajj and Umrah pilgrimages, and our shuttle service ensures you arrive at The Holy Mosque with ease. Both Mount Mina and Mount Arafat are just a stone's throw away. 

 Our spacious rooms can accommodate up to seven guests, making them perfect for families or groups traveling together. Each room boasts a modern and elegant design, premium mattresses, and luxurious cotton sheets to ensure your utmost comfort. The well-equipped bathrooms feature refreshing aerated showers and high-quality toiletries. For those seeking even more space to unwind, our suites offer a comfortable living area to relax in style. 

 After a long day of Umrah or Hajj, relax in our stylish lobby with cool marble floors and comfortable chairs. Complimentary Wi-Fi allows you to stay connected with loved ones back home.
address: Ibrahim Al Khalil Road Al Mesfalah, Mecca Saudi Arabia

name: Jabal Omar Marriott Hotel, Makkah
description: Jabal Omar Marriott Hotel, Makkah is located in the heart of the holy city of Makkah, which is one of the most luxurious five-star hotels in Jabal Omar complex, only 3 minutes- walk to Al Masjid Al-Haram. The hotel offers 426 luxurious and spacious rooms in a modern style including 52 luxurious suites, an architectural masterpiece lobby and reception area. Hotel features two restaurants: Spice Market and Olive, offering views of the Holy Haram and the city, in addition to Atrium Café, which serves snacks, light meals, pastries and soft drinks. You can discover our private prayer hall overlooking the Haram, and listen to the harm Imam via our linked sound system. The hotel also offers modern business center and medium-size meeting rooms with a large pre-function area. Enjoy your shopping in Jabal Omar commercial center next to the hotel and discover all that is unique and interesting about Makkah, Saudi Arabia, from Jabal Omar Marriott Hotel, Makkah, making your stay an unforgettable experience.

Looking for a place to stay in Mecca? Then look no further than Elaf Kinda Hotel, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Mecca to your doorstep.
Rooms at Elaf Kindah Makkah Hotel provide a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Elaf Kinda Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. You can also enjoy free breakfast.
While in Mecca be sure to experience local shrimp favorites at Albaik.
Mecca is also home to Kaaba, a popular historic site that is not too far from Elaf Kinda Hotel.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Elaf Kinda Hotel as you experience everything Mecca has to offer.

name: Elaf Bakkah Hotel
description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Mecca, Elaf Bakkah Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Elaf Bakkah Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Mecca.
Guest rooms offer a refrigerator, air conditioning, and a minibar, and Elaf Bakkah Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge. In addition, guests can enjoy an on-site restaurant during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Grand Mosque (1.4 mi) and Station of Ibrahim (1.4 mi), guests of Elaf Bakkah Hotel can easily experience some of Mecca's most well known attractions.
If you like Indian restaurants, Elaf Bakkah Hotel is conveniently located near paradise restaurant and Khair Restaurant.
Should time allow, UmrahLimo is a popular attraction that is within walking distance.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Elaf Bakkah Hotel is sure to make your visit to Mecca one worth remembering.

name: Centara Grand Mirage Beach Resort Pattaya
description: Centara Grand Mirage Beach Resort Pattaya is an exciting Lost World themed resort on Wong Amat Beach. You will enjoy 555 sea-facing rooms, suites and family residences (from 42 to 326 sqm.), eight dining venues, an award-winning spa, and a gigantic water park. The Lost World features a freeform pool, a meandering lazy river, waterslides, an adult’s pool, Jacuzzis, cliff jumping platforms, and Monsoon Island children’s water playground. Children can also enjoy two kids clubs, a club lounge dedicated to families, and a plethora of activities. The 230-metre beach is perfect for water sports. A PADI dive centre is also available. Spa Cenvaree is a true refuge for the senses and has 24 treatment rooms and a yoga and meditation pavilion. Other facilities include a fitness centre, two tennis courts and rock climbing facilities. A shuttle service connects to Central Festival Pattaya shopping and lifestyle centre. Bangkok’s Suvarnabhumi International Airport is approximately 90 minutes away.

name: Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch
description:
See why so many travelers make Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch their hotel of choice when visiting Zhongshan District. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a charming setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Close to some of Zhongshan District's most popular landmarks, such as Sihmianfo (0.8 mi) and Airport Alley (1.2 mi), Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch is a great destination for tourists.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a concierge. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.

At Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Zhongshan District.

name: Via Hotel Loft
description:
See why so many travelers make Via Hotel Loft their motel of choice when visiting Zhongshan District. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Close to some of Zhongshan District's most popular landmarks, such as SPOT-Taipei（Taipei Film House） (0.4 mi) and Jingfugong (0.6 mi), Via Hotel Loft is a great destination for tourists.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Via Hotel Loft offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator.
Guests of Via Hotel Loft are also welcome to enjoy free breakfast, located on site.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Zhongshan District's popular sukiyaki & shabu shabu restaurants such as Addiction Aquatic Development and Mihan Honke, all a short distance from Via Hotel Loft.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than National Revolutionary Martyrs' Shrine, Suho Memorial Paper Culture Museum, and Kuomintang Party History Museum, which are some popular Zhongshan District history museums – all conveniently located a short distance from the motel.
At Via Hotel Loft, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Zhongshan District.

name: citizenM Miami Brickell Hotel
description:
citizenM Miami Brickell is not only the first citizenM hotel in Miami - it's also our first ever with a swimming pool! In a city with all-year sunshine, we want to give the guests something extra special to enjoy, in addition to our usual fabulous design, smart bedrooms and contactless stays. The swimming pool is located outdoors on the rooftop, together with a fitness room and indoor/outdoor bar. For business travellers, the hotel will have 8 stylish and inspiring meeting rooms, available for booking anytime - AM, PM, all day and on weekends. citizenM hotels are in a category all on their own - affordable luxury. This means guests don't pay for the usual hotel cliches (like chocolates on pillows), but instead they enjoy all hotel essentials of the highest quality: beds, showers, entertainment, guest service, efficiency and more. Instead of a lobby, citizenM Miami Brickell will feature the fabulous (signature) living room instead of a lifeless lobby. In the living room: world-class art, colourful designer furniture, dozens of books, and 24/7 food within an arm's reach - just like at home. The citizenM living rooms are perfect for work, rest and play - with a craft cocktail in hand, of course. Every citizenM bedroom is optimised for maximum relaxation and designed for maximum 2 adults. All bedrooms are the same, so all guests enjoy the same luxury. In each bedroom: XL king-size bed with luxury European bedding and fluffy pillows, walk-in shower with jungle-like water pressure, full-size shower gels, flatscreen TV with entertainment and streaming capabilities, and superfast free Wi-Fi. Our hot & cold breakfast buffet comes with unique local treats, familiar favorites, and healthy options for everyone — including vegans and vegetarians. Pile your plate with warm pastries, scrambled eggs, fresh fruit, and more. 

citizenM Miami Brickell hotel has a rooftop pool! Access to the pool is for hotel guests only. All guests receive a tote bag, water bottle, a free welcome drink (alcohol for 21+ only), and access to private beach in South Beach (including two beach chairs and towels).

name: The Charles Hotel
description: N intimate ambiance and excellent service. Occupying a historic medieval building, the charming Charles Hotel has been beautifully restored whilst retaining many of its original features. The Charles Hotel is situated close to The Charles Bridge. Surrounded by good selection of bars and restaurants, this intimate property enjoys a romantic ambiance. Located in the charming historical district of Prague Mala Strana (also called Prague Lesser Town or Little Quarter of Prague) and close to the famous Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, romantic Kampa, Petrin parks and just across the bridge to the rest of Old Town. The Hotel Charles is part of the Royal Road, which starts in Nuremberg (Germany) and leads all the way to Prague Castle through the Powder Tower, Wenceslas Square and across Charles Bridge. All 31 rooms of our hotel are air conditioned. 25 Rooms and 6 suites are reflecting the building's rich heritage and providing our guests with comfortable accommodation, an exceptional service and modern amenities. Baroque-style rooms include satellite television, minibar, in-room safe and hairdryer. Breakfast room and lobby bar are necessary to make you feel special. Friendly, attentive staff and a perfect location make it an excellent choice. The Charles hotel is romantic accommodation in the middle of Prague history!

name: The President
description: The President Hotel in the centre of Prague is visited by fans of tourism and relaxation, namely thanks to its advantageous location. The President Hotel is located on the right bank of the Vltava river, between the Charles Bridge and the Cloister of St. Agnes of Bohemia. Thanks to its ideal position in the centre of Prague, the President Hotel is located only a short walk from renowned historical monuments such as the Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, Old Town Square, National Theatre, Jewish Quarter, Synagogues and other places of interest in the heart of one of the most beautiful cities of the Czech Republic. The unique position allows you to conveniently visit the Pařížská street, a luxurious shopping venue with an abundance of fashion shops and restaurants.

name: City Hotel Shanghai
description:
City Hotel Shanghai is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Shanghai, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge while staying at City Shanghai. In addition, City Shanghai offers a pool and an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Shanghai trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is paid public parking available nearby.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Shanghai, City Hotel Shanghai is located a short distance from Jing'an Temple (0.7 mi) and Jade Buddha Temple (1.5 mi).
While in Shanghai be sure to experience local tempura favorites at Shintori, Haiku by Hatsune, or Sun with Aqua.
Shanghai is also known for some great architectural buildings, including Shanghai Circus World, Oriental Pearl Tower (Dongfang Mingzhu), and Jin Mao Tower, which are not too far from City Hotel Shanghai.
Enjoy your stay in Shanghai!

name: Grand Central Hotel Shanghai
description:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Shanghai, look no further than Grand Central Hotel Shanghai.
Close to some of Shanghai's most popular landmarks, such as Old Town (Nanshi) (0.9 mi) and Shanghai Tower (1.4 mi), Grand Central Hotel Shanghai is a great destination for tourists.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and Grand Central Hotel Shanghai makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including room service and a concierge. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and a lounge during their visit.
If you’re looking for a cafe, consider a visit to Starbucks Reserve Roastery Shanghai, Wow Cafe & Bar, or The Press by Inno Coffee, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Grand Central Hotel Shanghai.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Yu Garden (Yuyuan) (0.8 mi), The Bund (Wai Tan) (0.7 mi), or Oriental Pearl Tower (Dongfang Mingzhu) (1.1 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
The staff at Grand Central Hotel Shanghai looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.
